modName: Arrowshots x Dungeon x Quest x Boss Package
summary: Take on a quest given to you by the real Dohvakiin to retrieve the horn of dragon born which was lost centuries ago, Venture in to the depths of Terror north\'s tomb and retrieve the horn from the daedric prince Tez.
descriptionHtml:
************IF DOWNLOADING THROUGH MANAGER DOESN\'T WORK, INSTALL IT MANUALLY************
Yes it is finally here, my Epic, Dungeon, Quest and Boss Package.

This is designed for a quest i wanted to make for the old Dohvakiin who was \'apparantly\' Slain decades ago, but now i have created a quest were he returns to retrieve the deserted Horn of Dragonborn from Tez of Terrornorths Tomb which is located along the river in riverwood. with This active you must venture into my custom made dungeon, and retrieve the horn in the depths of the tomb battling surprises along the way.

The Quest Begins In the Sleeping Giant Inn in which you will find \'The Real Dohvakiin Dragonborn\' which will begin your quest =)

You will encounter riddles, very hard challenges such as the Daedric Prince Boss who has the power to turn anything into dust and also a Magnificent amount of Experience, Gold and many great items.

This mod is Compatible with every other mod.

This is my first ever dungeon / quest mod guys Which i put over 40 hours of work into and i hope you guys like it, if you do please Comment, Favourite and follow for more Mods. <3

Problems:
The problem with the NPC speech will be fixed soon enough when i get a mic since i dont you cant see the NPC\'s subtitles. so till then bare with me.
author: Arrow_shot
